member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.IO.LineReader.Read
member.summary: Filtered read of the next source char. Counters are incremented.
member.remarks: NewLine sequences (CR/LF, LF, CR) are normalized to LF.

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.CssCompactor.CssParser.ParseAtRule
member.summary: (BNF) at-rule : ATKEYWORD S* any* [ block | ';' S* ];
member.remarks: NOTE: each at-rule might parse differently according to CSS3 The @media block for example contains a block of statements while other at-rules with a block contain a block of declarations

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.CssCompactor.CssParser.ParseRuleSet
member.summary: (BNF) ruleset : selector? '{' S* declaration? [ ';' S* declaration? ]* '}' S*;

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.CssCompactor.CssParser.ParseDeclaration
member.summary: (BNF) declaration : property ':' S* value; (BNF) property : IDENT S*;

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.CssCompactor.CssParser.ParseValue

member.summary: Copies chars from start until the position before the current position

member.name: T:JsonFx.BuildTools.IO.ReadFilter

member.summary: Creates a Trie out of ReadFilters

member.name: T:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.HtmlDistiller
member.summary: Parses HTML, repairing and scrubbing against various whitelist filters.
member.remarks: Note: this class is thread-safe (all external changes are locked first)

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.HtmlDistiller.BeginIncrementalParsing
member.summary: Starts parsing to be performed incrementally
member.remarks: There is a performance hit for parsing in chunks.

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.HtmlDistiller.EndIncrementalParsing
member.summary: Stops incremental parsing and completes tag balancing, etc.

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.HtmlDistiller.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the source using the current settings.

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.HtmlDistiller.ParseTag
member.summary: Attempts to parse the next sequence as a tag
member.returns: null if no tag was found (e.g. just LessThan char)

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.HtmlDistiller.ParseBlock(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses for "unparsed blocks" (e.g. comments, code blocks)
member.remarks: This supports comments, DocType declarations, CDATA sections, and ASP/JSP-style blocks.

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.HtmlDistiller.Init(System.String)
member.remarks: Does not SyncLock, call inside lock

member.summary: Causes parsing to end preserving partial source

member.summary: Defines a set of HTML tag/attribute/style filters

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.Filters.IHtmlFilter.FilterTag(JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.HtmlTag)
member.summary: Filters tags, optionally allowing altering of tag

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.Filters.IHtmlFilter.FilterAttribute(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Filters attributes, optionally allowing altering of attribute value

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.Filters.IHtmlFilter.FilterStyle(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Filters styles, optionally allowing altering of style value

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.Filters.IHtmlFilter.FilterLiteral(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String@)
member.summary: Filters literals, optionally allowing replacement of literal value
member.returns: true if should be used to replace literal
member.remarks: This uses the original source string, start and end rather than passing a substring in order to not generate a strings for every literal. The internals of HtmlDistiller do not produce extra strings for literals so for efficiency sake, care should be taken so that filters do not produce excessive extra strings either.

member.name: T:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.Filters.WordBreakFilter
member.summary: Defines a literal filter which optionally breaks words at a certain length

member.name: M:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.Filters.WordBreakFilter.FilterLiteral(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String@)
member.summary: Optionally allows breaking of long words

member.name: P:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.Filters.WordBreakFilter.HtmlWriter
member.summary: Gets and sets the HtmlWriter associated with this instance.

member.name: T:JsonFx.BuildTools.HtmlDistiller.Filters.HyperlinkFilter
member.summary: Defines a filter which optionally auto-links URLs in literals

member.summary: Optionally finds any URLs and wraps them with a hyperlink
member.returns: true if should be used to replace literal
